main_topic.title: Will we no longer be able to use GPUs and TPUs in competitions?
main_topic.content: Will we no longer be able to use GPUs and TPUs in competitions?ns?

comments.author: Akeryu Ryuu
comments.content: I don't know if they are experimenting with new UI but you can find the accelerator option in session options on the right side where you turn off internet for the notebook.
